resources.string: Zi edzi ake be nàdo le eme

Ðo amadede gbãtɔ si wowɔ le vome le gɔmedzedzea me
Ðoɖowo static icon ƒe amadede. Meɖe asi le agbalẽdzraɖoƒe ƒe dzesi ƒe amadede ƒe didi ŋu o.
Na mɔ̃ si ŋu ke le ɖeɖeko. Ne èka ɖe edzi ko hafi kpɔe ɖa.

Fia faɛlwo ƒe lolome kple nusiwo le agbalẽdzraɖoƒewo ƒe xexlẽme
Fia Mɔɖeɖewo na Faɛlwo kple Agbalẽdzraɖoƒewo
Ku ɖe Amaze Faɛl Dɔdzikpɔla ŋu
Tɔtrɔ siwo womedzra ɖo o le asiwò, èdi be yeadzra wo ɖo hafi ado le emea?
Esia nye nudzraɖoƒe. Nuwɔna kae nàdi be yeawɔ?
Esia nye package installer. Nuwɔna kae nàdi be yeawɔ?
Nyabiase kple Ŋuɖoɖo, Kpekpeɖeŋu & Kuxiwo Gbɔkpɔkpɔ
Zã dzesi siwo le gota na nɔnɔmetatawo kple videowo
Enaa megbemɔzɔzɔ si wowɔ ɖe ɖoɖo nu le xexlẽdzesiawo tame
Esia nye ɖoɖowɔɖi ƒe dɔwɔɖoɖo, etutu ateŋu ahe ɖoɖoa ƒe malikenyenye vɛ.\nYi edzi?
Woaɖe nudzraɖoƒe ƒe faɛlwo ayi agbalẽdzraɖoƒe sia. Asixɔxɔ gbãtɔ enye agbalẽdzraɖoƒe si me nudzraɖoƒe le.
Ne èle egɔme dzem la, woaɖe agbalẽdzraɖoƒe si wokpɔ nyitsɔ laa na tab ɖesiaɖe la afia
Ne wotsɔ ŋutigbalẽa de ama system navigation bar la alo metsɔe de amae o
Ðo amadede ɖe UI ƒe akpa vovovowo ŋu
Ðo amadede ɖe UI ƒe akpa gãwo na miame tab
Ðo amadede ɖe FAB kple UI sue bubuwo dzi elements
\t ƒe ke ƒe nyatakakadzraɖoƒe si nàna nuŋɔŋlɔ ƒe mɔɖeɖe be wòawɔ dɔ
App hiã na nudzraɖoƒe ƒe mɔɖeɖe hafi wòayi edzi. Ne ète fli ɖe dzeɖonya sia me la, ado le dɔwɔnua me.
Di to BASH ƒe atsyã ƒe nyagbɔgblɔ edziedzi zazã me
Ne woɖoe la, woatsɔ nyagbɔgblɔ si wozãna edziedzi asɔ kple faɛl ŋkɔ bliboa, . adi dzɔdzɔ ne menye nenema o.
Kpɔ egbɔ be yedo ƒome kple Wi -Fi
Amaze FTP Server si le dɔ wɔm
Wotia ʋudzeƒe ƒe xexlẽdzesi si mesɔ o
Ðo amadede ɖe UI ƒe akpa gãwo na tab ɖusime
Kpɔ míaƒe dzɔtsoƒe ƒe kɔpi le GitHub
Gblɔ vodadawo alo bia nɔnɔme yeye
Gblɔ Amaze le wò gbe me
Woɖe PayPal ID ɖe clipboard dzi
Womekpɔ dzesidenu o, gbugbɔ le wɔwɔm...

Alesi woawɔ akpɔ Windows ƒe agbalẽdzraɖoƒe si woama le Android (SMB) dzi


Na Faɛl Mamã nawɔ dɔ le Windows

Ʋu Control Panel la, zi Choose HomeGroup kple Sharing ƒe tiatia siwo le Network te dzi kple Internet dzi, eye nàzi "Trɔ Mamã ƒe Ðoɖo Deŋgɔwo," na "File kple... Agbalẽtamɔ̃ ƒe Mamã" ƒe nɔnɔme.


Fail Mamã ƒe ɖoɖo bubuwo

Àte ŋu awɔ ɖoɖo ɖe mama ƒe ɖoɖo deŋgɔ bubuawo hã ŋu le afisia. 
 Le kpɔɖeŋu me, àte ŋu ana woate ŋu akpɔ wò faɛlwo nyagbe ɣaɣla manɔmee ne èka ɖe wo katã dzi mɔ̃ siwo le miaƒe nutoa me network dzi. Ne wonya wɔ faɛl kple agbalẽtamɔ̃ mama ŋudɔ ko la, àte ŋui ʋu File Explorer alo Windows Explorer, zi agbalẽdzraɖoƒe aɖe si nèdi be yeama la dzi kple ɖusi, eye tia Nɔnɔmewo. 
 Zi Mamã ƒe dzesi dzi eye nàna agbalẽdzraɖoƒea nanɔ network la dzi.


Kpɔ egbɔ be mɔ̃ eveawo siaa le Wifi ɖeka dzi

Nɔnɔme sia nana be faɛlwo nɔa teƒea ƒe network dzi, eyata wò PC kple asitelefonwo ele be wòanɔ nutoa me ƒe nyatakakadzraɖoƒe ɖeka ma ke dzi. Màte ŋu age ɖe Windows ƒe agbalẽdzraɖoƒe si woama o to Internet dzi alo ne wò smartphone do ka kple eƒe asitelefon dzi nyatakakawo — eya ele be woatsɔe aƒo ka na Wi-Fi.


Di IP Adrɛs

Ʋu Sedede ƒe Nyatakaka. Ŋlɔ 'ipconfig' eye nàzi Enter dzi. Di Default Gateway (Agbo si Woɖo Ðe Ðoɖo Nu le wò network adapter te na wò router's IP adrɛs. Di nu \"IPv4 Adrɛs\" le adapter ƒe akpa ma ke te be nàdi wò kɔmpiuta's IP adrɛs.


Ŋlɔ nyatakakawo ɖe SMB ƒe nyatakakaɖaka me
Mateŋu ama faɛl siwo wu 100 o
Ŋkeke si wotrɔ asi le eŋu
Ele lalam be dɔwɔwɔ nawu enu
Ahiã be nàwɔ kɔpi na faɛl sia ɖe nudzraɖoƒe be nàʋui
Mɔ si woɖe ɖe clipboard dzi
Mɔ yi ɖe nyatakakadzraɖoƒe ƒe ke me be woama
Ɣla dɔwɔnu ƒe akpaa le ɖokuiwò si esime nèle ʋuʋum
Amadede ƒe tɔtrɔ ne èle tabwo ʋuʋum
Dɔdada ɖe go si me wowɔa nu aduadu le
Dɔwɔwɔ do kpo nu na faɛl siwo gbɔna
Ðo nyagbe vevi na nya ɣaɣla. Gblẽe ƒuƒlu be nàɖee ɖa.
Zã asibidɛ ƒe dzesi nàtsɔ aɖo kpe nya ɣaɣla dzi
Asibidɛ ƒe dzesi aɖeke meŋlɔ ŋkɔ o
Dedienɔnɔ aɖeke meli le lockscreen me o found
Woɖo aɖaŋu na wò, ne ètrɔ wò dedienɔnɔ ƒe ɖoɖo tso System ƒe ɖoɖowo, màteŋu aɖe nya sia gɔme o.
Medo kpo nyagbe ɣaɣla aɖe ɖeɖeɖa
Ka asi sensor ŋu be wòayi edzi
Amaze Cloud ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ si womekpɔ o. Taflatse wɔ kɔpi tso Play Store.
Medo kpo kadodoa ƒe agbatsɔtsɔ o. Taflatse ʋu Amaze Cloud zi ɖeka.
Èdi be yeaɖe alilikpo ƒe kadodoa ɖaa?
Woɖe kadodo si woate ŋu ama ɖe clipboard me
Ewu enu ŋkuɖodzinu, taflatse kɔ RAM aɖewo ɖa
Dzesi bu, taflatse gage ɖe eme ake
Ele be ŋkɔ nanɔ faɛl ŋu
Do kpo Alilikpo kadodo yeye tsɔtsɔ kpee
Do kpo Alilikpo ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ ƒe kpeɖodzi
Vodada le teƒea ƒe inet adrɛs xɔxɔ
Mɔ siwo wowɔ ɖe ɖoɖo nu
Zi mɔ ƒe ʋuƒo dzi didi be nàŋlɔ mɔ tɔxɛ aɖe
Ʋu faɛlwo abe dɔ yeye ene
Enaa mɔnukpɔkpɔ wò be nàʋu faɛlwo le dɔ vovovowo me. Kpɔ wo tso system recents screen.
Amaze File Manager FTP Server\'s Nyatakakawo
Do kpo faɛlwo tsɔtsɔ de eme. Taflatse kpɔ wò kadodoa ɖa.

Womateŋu aɖo host '%1$s' ƒe nyateƒenyenye anyi o.

%2$s safui ƒe asibidɛ ƒe dzesi nye %3$s.

Taflatse zi "Ẽ" dzi be nàɖo kpe edzi dzeside; ne menye nenema o la, taflatse zi "Ao".
Ŋgɔyiyi ƒe kpododonu: Meteŋu ɖo kpe edzi kple zãla ƒe ŋkɔ kple nyagbe si wona o.
Ge ɖe eme ƒe kpododonu: Meteŋu ɖo kpe edzi kple zãla ƒe ŋkɔ kple ame ŋutɔ ƒe safui si wona o.

ATEŊU BE AME AÐE LE NU GBƆGBƆ WƆM!

Ame aɖe ate ŋu anɔ to ɖom wò le adzame fifia (amegbetɔ si le titina ƒe amedzidzedze)! Ate ŋu adzɔ hã be ɖeko wotrɔ host key la teti koe nye ema. Asibidɛ ƒe dzesi na dutoƒo safui si adzɔge amedzroxɔla ɖo ɖa la mesɔ kple esi wodzra ɖo ɖe Amaze me o.

Taflatse te ɖe wò dɔwɔɖoɖo dzikpɔla ŋu alo ɖo kadodo yeye be wòayi edzi aɖo kadodo kple dɔdzikpɔla.
Mɔ kpuiwo wɔwɔ medoa alɔ wò gɔmedzedze o.
E\'. s woɖo aɖaŋu be woazã \".zip\" abe faɛl ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ ene.
Nuwo ƒe ɖoɖowɔwɔ faɛl dzikpɔla na Android
Eɖo aɖaŋu be nàzã \".txt\" abe faɛl ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ ene.
Tia ame ŋutɔ ƒe safui hena ɖaseɖiɖi
Safui ƒe nyagbe si mesɔ o.
Decoder si sɔ aɖeke meli si woatsɔ aɖe PEM gɔme o.
Do kpo nya ɣaɣla ƒe nuŋɔŋlɔ yeye wɔwɔ le nyatakakadzraɖoƒe
Nyatakaka aɖeke meli tso faɛl sia ŋu o
Mateŋui o, taflatse gbugbɔ ʋu tso dɔwɔwɔ mamlɛtɔ me
Nane gblẽ, afima\ \'s nothing to open
Faɛl la didi akpa eye womateŋu atrɔ asi le eŋu o, ke hã àteŋu axlẽ %d ŋɔŋlɔdzesi gbãtɔwo
Faɛl si woʋu la nye nuxexlẽ ɖeɖeko.
Dzra Faɛl Si Wotsɔ Nya Ɣla Ðe Edzi Abe...
Dzra agbalẽdzraɖoƒe si wotsɔ nya ɣaɣlawo ŋlɔ ɖo abe...

AESCrypt nye faɛl ƒe nya ɣaɣla ƒe ɖoɖo si le ʋuʋu ɖi si wotu ɖe AES nya ɣaɣla dzi. Woateŋu atsɔe hã, ateŋu aɖe nya ɣaɣlawo gɔme kple AESCrypt dɔwɔɖoɖowo le mɔ̃ bubuwo dzi.

AESCrypt ƒe nyatakakadzraɖoƒe

Amaze\'s Encryption Format hã nɔ te ɖe AES nya ɣaɣla dzi; gake to vovo na AESCrypt ƒe nɔnɔme la, mɔ̃ sia koe ate ŋu aɖe eƒe nya ɣaɣlawo gɔme; hã mele be nàɖe Amaze File Manager ɖa le mɔ̃ sia dzi alo atrɔ alesi nètu screen la o, ne menye nenema o la, mɔ aɖeke manɔ asiwò si dzi nàto agbugbɔ faɛl si wotsɔ nya ɣaɣlawo ŋlɔ la axɔ o.
Ele be faɛl siwo wotsɔ nya ɣaɣlawo ŋlɔ la nazã \".aze\" abe faɛl ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ ene.
Ele be faɛl siwo wotsɔ nya ɣaɣlawo ŋlɔ la nazã \".aes\" abe faɛl ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ ene.
Mateŋu aŋlɔ ɖe edzi o file.
File si wodzra ɖo abe \'%s\' ene.
Woaɣla faɛl si wowɔ la ɖe faɛl ƒe xexlẽdzesi me.
App hiã mɔɖeɖe be wòaɖo dɔwɔɖoɖowo ɖe edzi.
Womateŋu aɖe faɛl aɖewo le nudzraɖoƒea o; archive ateŋu agblẽ alo etso dzɔtsoƒe vɔ̃ɖi.
Àyi Android\'s filesystem azɔ le dedienɔnɔ ta. Taflatse tia USB-mɔ̃a tso xexlẽdzesi siwo le miame la me.
Akpe na wò ɖe nudzɔdzɔa ta, esia nana míeʋãa dzi! (:
Na marquee effect nawɔ dɔ na faɛl ŋkɔwo
Meteŋu o open archive \"%s\".Míateŋu aʋu nudzraɖoƒea o, alo nudzraɖoƒea gblẽ.

ATEŊU BE AME AÐE LE NU GBƆGBƆ WƆM!

Ame aɖe ateŋu anɔ to ɖom wò fifia (ame-in-the-middle attack)!Ateŋu adzɔ hã be ɖeko wotrɔ host key la teti koe nye ema.Asibidɛ ƒe dzesi elabena dutoƒo safui si adzɔge amedzroxɔla ɖo ɖa la mesɔ kple esi wodzra ɖo ɖe Amaze me o.

Àteŋu ayi edzi kple amedzroxɔla ƒe asibidɛ ƒe dzesi ɖɔɖɔɖo alo ate fli ɖe SSH kadodo ƒe ɖoɖowo ɖɔɖɔɖo me.
Fail aɖewo do kpo nu le esi womewɔ dɔ o ta dɔwɔwɔ
Do ka kple network alo na AP nawɔ dɔ
Taflatse, mele be wòadzɔ nenema hafi o.
Gblɔ vodada sia to e-mail dzi
Gblɔ vodada sia to telegram dzi
Kɔpi nyatakaka si woɖo ɖe ɖoɖo nu
Taflatse kpɔe ɖa be nya aɖe si le nu ƒom tso wò gbagbã ŋu la li xoxo hã.
Wowɔ kɔpi na afɔku ŋuti nyatakaka clipboard
Tɔ asi le IPC ƒe asidede agbalẽ te ƒe dodokpɔ ŋu (Na SMBv1 dɔdzikpɔla xoxowo - UNSAFE!)
Mateŋu atrɔ ŋkɔ na faɛl o %s - %s
Klɔa faɛl ʋuʋu ƒe dɔwɔɖoɖo siwo wotia ɖa
Zã domenyinu ƒe xexlẽdzesi na root
Ne wowɔe la, zãa domenyinu mɔnu tsɔ ŋlɔa faɛlwo
RAR nudzraɖoƒe \"%s\" nye RAR v5 nudzraɖoƒe si womedo alɔe o.
Ahiã be nàgbugbɔ adze FTP dɔdzikpɔla gɔme hafi tɔtrɔwo nawɔ dɔ.
Nudzraɖoƒe ƒe nyagbe si mesɔ o.
Meteŋu ɖe nudzraɖoƒe ƒe nuŋɔŋlɔ \"%s\" ɖe \"%s\" me o.
Tia hehe kple tsɔtsrɔ̃ ƒe didi (Dodokpɔ)
Ka asi eŋu eye nàhee be nàʋu alo awɔ kɔpi na faɛlwo
Ka asi eŋu eye nàhee be nàtia faɛlwo
Na SAF ƒe mɔɖeɖe na FTP dɔdzikpɔla

Esi wònye be esiae nye wò FTP dɔdzikpɔla ƒe duƒuƒu gbãtɔ, eye nèle mɔ̃a ƒe ememe nudzraɖoƒe zãm abe agbalẽdzraɖoƒe si woama ene ta la, taflatse ɖe mɔ na Amaze be wòage ɖe nudzraɖoƒea zazã me SAF.\n\n
Zi ɖeka koe wòle be nàwɔ esia, vaseɖe ɣebubuɣi si nàtia teƒe yeye si nàma.

Tso esime Android 10 la, Android de mɔxexe ɖe nyatakakadzraɖoƒe aɖewo nu, eye ele be woatsɔ Storage Access Framework age ɖe eme.\n \nTaflatse ɖe mɔ na Amaze be wòage ɖe agbalẽdzraɖoƒea tso ɖoɖoa ƒe faɛl dzikpɔla to asiƒoƒo ɖe \"Ðe mɔ na Mɔɖeɖe\".
Na esia nawɔ dɔ hena kpekpeɖeŋu na mɔ̃a ƒe gotagome nudzraɖoƒe zazã le Android ƒe tɔtrɔ yeyewo dzi
Wogbugbɔ ɖo FTP dɔdzikpɔla ƒe mɔ si woama la ɖe ememe nudzraɖoƒe esime nèle tɔtrɔm yi domenyinu ƒe faɛlɖoɖo ƒe dɔwɔwɔ. Taflatse tia mɔ yeye to menu si le ɖusime le etame la zazã me ne ehiã.
Wogbugbɔ ɖo FTP dɔdzikpɔla ƒe mɔ si woama la ɖe ememe nudzraɖoƒe
Èle mɔ si hiã ke ƒe mɔɖeɖe tiam. Taflatse na root explorer nawɔ dɔ le ɖoɖowo me nenye be wò mɔ̃a nye root.

Èle mɔ si hiã root access tiam, si na be nuxexlẽ/ŋɔŋlɔ ƒe dɔwɔwɔwo le filesystem bliboa me le wò device dzi, eye afɔku le eme - vodada siwo me ŋumaɖɔɖo mele o ate ŋu adzɔ brick your device!\n\nÈka ɖe edzia?
Vodada le URI \"%s\" ʋuʋu me hena nuxexlẽ.
\"%s\" nye nudzraɖoƒe si gblẽ.\nMessage from extractor: \"%s\"
File meteŋui o woaʋui to dɔwɔnu sia zazã me
Wɔ Google DriveTM kadodo hena faɛlwo dzi kpɔkpɔ tso Amaze Faɛl Dɔdzikpɔla me.
Ðo kpe edzi be yeazã Google DriveTM
Vodada le adzɔnuwo ƒe xexlẽdzesi xɔm tso Google Play.

Tso Android 11 dzi la, Google bia tso File Managers si be woabia mɔɖeɖe tso zãla gbɔ hena faɛl siwo katã le mɔ̃a dzi dzikpɔkpɔ. Nyatakakawo tsitotsito le afisia. 

Amaze File Manager hã hiã mɔɖeɖe sia. Ne èzi "Grant" dzi le afisia vɔ la, taflatse tia Allow access to manage all files option le screen si kplɔe ɖo dzi. 

Ne ète fli ɖe dzeɖonya sia me la, ado le dɔwɔnua me.
Trɔ asi le faɛl dzikpɔla ƒe tanya, amadedewo kple dzedzeme ŋu
Dzra nyatakaka siwo woaɖe afia dzi, trɔ asi le axadzinuŋɔŋlɔa ŋu, eye nàtrɔ asi le UI ƒe didiwo ŋu
Trɔ asi le nuwɔnawo abe didi deŋgɔ kple nenye be woaʋu faɛlwo abe dɔ yeye ene
Ðo nyagbe ɣaɣla kple nya ɣaɣlawo tsɔtsɔ yi duta
Dɔda ɖe duta/tsɔ yi duta Amaze ƒe ɖoɖowo
Files nyitsɔ laa la, wokpɔe to Amaze dzi
Faɛl siwo wowɔ alo trɔ asi le wo ŋu nyitsɔ laa
Mekpɔ mɔ si dzi woato aʋu faɛl la o
Meteŋu wɔ dɔ tso nudzraɖoƒe si wobia ŋu o

Wo le mɔ trɔm na wò yi Amaze File Utilities gbɔ. Enye míaƒe mɔnu si le ʋuʋu ɖi si me odio/video/nɔnɔmetata/nuŋlɔɖi kpɔlawo le, si na be nàte ŋu adzro faɛl gbegblẽwo me be nàna nudzraɖoƒe navo, atsɔ wo ayi kabakaba to Wifi P2P zazã me kple bubu geɖe.\nTaflatse do alɔ mí to edodokpɔ me.
Akpe na wò be nèɖo Amaze File Utilities ɖe wò kɔmpiuta dzi. Wole mɔ fiam wò yi dɔwɔnua dzi.
Ma nuŋlɔɖi siwo wolé to email / telegram dzi

Èka ɖe edzi be yedi be yeaʋu faɛl si gbɔnaa?

Ŋkɔ:

%s

%s

%s

SHA256 :

Le Google Play ƒe ɖoɖo ƒe sedede nu la, womeɖe mɔ na dɔwɔɖoɖowo be woawɔ yeye le wo ɖokui si o. Taflatse trɔ asi le dɔwɔnua ŋu tso Google Play.
Mete ŋu xɔ agbalẽvi ŋuti nyatakakawo tso faɛl \"%s\" me o. Fail si woɖo la menye APK o, alo package faɛl la gblẽ.
Bia kpeɖodzi hafi nàtutu faɛlwo. Esia nuwɔametɔ nye dziɖeleameƒo ŋutɔ!
Eɖoɖo ɖe duta do kpo nu: meteŋu ŋlɔ kɔpi faɛl o
Etsɔtsɔ va do kpo nu: meteŋu xlẽ megbenya o file
Etsɔtsɔ yi duta do kpo nu na:
Amaze Cloud Plugin mewɔ dɔ kple F- o. Droid ƒe tɔtrɔ.Taflatse zã Amaze ƒe Play Store tɔ.
Tɔ asi fefewɔla ƒe tameɖoɖo ƒe ʋuʋudediwo ŋu
Tɔwɔ Amaze inbuilt media players tso faɛl tiatia me
Womekpɔ dɔwɔnu aɖeke si akpɔ tameɖoɖo sia gbɔ o. Wɔ you have DocumentsUI installed?
Woɖe Alilikpo me Kadodo ƒe ɖaseɖigbalẽwo ɖa
Nublanuitɔe la, míete ŋu trɔ wò cloud connection credentials yi database schema yeyea me o, eye eva hiã be míaɖe wo ɖa le app la me.Taflatse wɔ alilikpo ƒe kadodoa ake.
